title: Papillon Rouge
description: For over a hundred years, the private luxury resort known to its members as Papillon Rouge has provided a secret, and very special service. Its unique collection of beautiful women happily and lovingly cater to lovers of Pussy Torture, which they have brought to a fine art.But now, things were going wrong. Two of the girls are killed and an unknown enemy plots to destroy Papillon Rouge itself. In desperation, traumatized ex-police woman Jamie Killian is hired as the new Chief of Security and tasked with protecting this ancient institution, but who is friend and who is foe?Unique scenes of pussy torture combine with treachery and murder in a fast moving story of sexual sadism and mystery.This book was banned by Amazon but is available from:http://www.tabooreading.com/andhttp://www.a1adultebooks.com/
author: V.W. Singer
